text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Umm…… Sorry for suddenly asking, 
but could you let me see your hands?

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I've been wondering for a while now
since you do a lot of work at your desk.
Let's see……

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah…… Looks like the areas from 
your wrists to your fingers are 
particularly stiff…… Um, would 
you let me massage them for you?

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I've learned a massage that can help 
with swelling because I want you to 
stay healthy, Trainer.
